meanings.definition: Having the shape of a wedge.
meanings.sent1: The doorstop was wedgier than the bookend.
meanings.sent2: The knife became wedgier as it was sharpened.
meanings.sent3: The wedgier piece of cheese always got stuck in the slicer.
meanings.sent4: The wedgier end of the log fit perfectly into the gap.
meanings.sent5: The wedgier rock was ideal for splitting wood.

meanings.definition: Tending to force apart or divide.
meanings.sent1: The wedgier tool helped separate the stuck parts.
meanings.sent2: The wedgier chisel was perfect for carving intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: The wedgier spatula made flipping pancakes a breeze.

meanings.sent5: The wedgier wedge slowly split the log in half.
